title: Error in eval from last night's training
body:
```
INFO:root:Evaluating network on across object data

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ValueError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-3-f5a9e08254a1> in <module>()
     29         if EVALUATE:
     30             DCE = DenseCorrespondenceEvaluation
---> 31             DCE.run_evaluation_on_network(model_folder, num_image_pairs=num_image_pairs)
     32 

/home/manuelli/code/dense_correspondence/evaluation/evaluation.pyc in run_evaluation_on_network(model_folder, num_image_pairs, num_matches_per_image_pair, save_folder_name, compute_descriptor_statistics, cross_scene, dataset)
   2032                 os.makedirs(across_object_output_dir)
   2033             logging.info("Evaluating network on across object data")
-> 2034             df = DCE.evaluate_network_across_objects(dcn=dcn, dataset=dataset)
   2035             across_object_csv = os.path.join(across_object_output_dir, "data.csv")
   2036             df.to_csv(across_object_csv)

/home/manuelli/code/dense_correspondence/evaluation/evaluation.pyc in evaluate_network_across_objects(dcn, dataset, num_image_pairs)
    327             dataframe_list_temp =\
    328                 DenseCorrespondenceEvaluation.single_across_object_image_pair_quantitative_analysis(dcn,
--> 329                 dataset, scene_name_a, scene_name_b, image_a_idx, image_b_idx, object_id_a, object_id_b)
    330 
    331             assert dataframe_list_temp is not None

/home/manuelli/code/dense_correspondence/evaluation/evaluation.pyc in single_across_object_image_pair_quantitative_analysis(dcn, dataset, scene_name_a, scene_name_b, img_a_idx, img_b_idx, object_id_a, object_id_b, num_uv_a_samples, debug)
    688         DCE = DenseCorrespondenceEvaluation
    689 
--> 690         sampled_idx_list = random_sample_from_masked_image(mask_a, num_uv_a_samples)
    691 
    692         for i in range(num_uv_a_samples):

/home/manuelli/code/dense_correspondence/correspondence_tools/correspondence_finder.pyc in random_sample_from_masked_image(img_mask, num_samples)
     79     idx_tuple = img_mask.nonzero()
     80     num_nonzero = len(idx_tuple[0])
---> 81     rand_inds = random.sample(range(0,num_nonzero), num_samples)
     82 
     83     sampled_idx_list = []

/usr/lib/python2.7/random.pyc in sample(self, population, k)
    321         n = len(population)
    322         if not 0 <= k <= n:
--> 323             raise ValueError("sample larger than population")
    324         random = self.random
    325         _int = int

ValueError: sample larger than population


```
